versos: (forgat) Psalm 106:21 KJV - They forgat God their saviour, which had done great things in Egypt;;;;
(ill) Deuteronomy 7:15 - The Lord will keep you free from every disease. He will not inflict on you the horrible diseases you knew in Egypt.;;;
(brink) Ezekiel 7:12 - The time has come; the day has arrived. Let not the buyer rejoice nor the seller grieve, for my wrath is on the whole crowd.;;;
(north) Jeremiah 1:14 - "The Lord said to me, 'From the north disaster will be poured out on all who live in the land.'";;;
(sprung) Isaiah 61:11 - For as the earth brings forth its sprouts
(office) Romans 11:13 - "I am talking to you Gentiles. Inasmuch as I am the apostle to the Gentiles, I take pride in my ministry.";;;
(hastily) Proverbs 21:5 - "The plans of the diligent lead surely to abundance, but everyone who is hasty comes only to want.";;;

(hitherto) 2 Chronicles 6:10 - "The Lord hath performed his word that he spake, and I am risen up in the room of David my father, and sit on the throne of Israel, as the Lord promised, and have built the house for the name of the Lord God of Israel.";;;
(canst) Job 26:14: "Lo, these are parts of his ways: but how little a portion is heard of him but the thunder of his power who can understand";;;
(bank) Luke 19:23: "Why then didnt you put my money on deposit, so that when I came back, I could have collected it with interest";;;
(lean) Psalm 56:3 - "When I am afraid, I put my trust in you.";;;

(withered) Matthew 21:19 - "Seeing a fig tree by the road, he went up to it but found nothing on it except leaves. Then he said to it, "May you never bear fruit again" Immediately the tree withered.";;;
(declare) Psalm 19:1 - "The heavens declare the glory of God; the skies proclaim the work of his hands.";;;
(sheweth) 1 John 3:16 - "Hereby perceive we the love of God, because he laid down his life for us: and we ought to lay down our lives for the brethren.";;;

(consume) Jeremiah 12:4 - How long will the land lie parched and the grass in every field be withered Because those who live in it are wicked, the animals and birds have perished. Moreover, the people are saying, "He will not see what happens to us.";;;
(perish) John 3:16 - "For God so loved the world that he gave his one and only Son, that whoever believes in him shall not perish but have eternal life.";;;
(ring) Genesis 41:42 - "Then Pharaoh took his signet ring from his finger and put it on Joseph's finger. He dressed him in robes of fine linen and put a gold chain around his neck.";;;
